sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Comment } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useMutation, useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import { REPLY_DELETE_MUTATION } from '../api/reply' import { USER_PROFILE_LIST_QUERY } from '../api/user' const DEFAULT_ICON = 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/small/matt.jpg' const CustomReply = ({ id, content, posted, username }) => { const user = localStorage.getItem('user') const [ replyDelete ] = useMutation(REPLY_DELETE_MUTATION) const { data: allProfiles } = useQuery(USER_PROFILE_LIST_QUERY) const handleOnDelete = () => { replyDelete({ variables: { id: id } }) window.location.reload(false) } console.log(allProfiles) return (
{username}
{posted}
 {content} {(user === username) ? ( Delete ) : null}
) } export default CustomReply
